author: craigmcc
msg: Fix a further vulnerability related to the "may expose JSP source code"
vulnerability.  Creative use of URL-encoded characters would also cause
security constraints to be bypassed -- this is now corrected.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a note about downloading JavaMail and the activation framework in order
to build the mail-related object factories.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add unit tests to validate URL decoding of getServletPath() and

author: craigmcc
msg: Use RequestUtil.URLDecode() instead of URLDecoder.decode() in order to
deal with character encoding issues correctly.

author: craigmcc
